name: Malathi Iyengar
description: Ms Malathi R Iyengar is a freelance writer specializing in subjects of banking and personal finance. She is banking professional with 17 years of experience in personal finance and consumer banking sector. In addition to her professional experience, Ms Iyengar is a yoga enthusiast and a mother of a young girl at home.
